body: These soft boots are partially made out of living leaves and other natural materials. They enable the wearer to move nimbly about in virtually any surroundings, granting a +5 competence bonus on Acrobatics checks.
name: Boots of Elvenkind
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Feet/Feet Slot Wondrous Items/Boots of Elvenkind
